name: forge-cli-utils
description: Command line tools for Autodesk Forge services.
author: Petr Broz <petr.broz@autodesk.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:win && npm run build:macos && npm run build:linux
scripts.build:win: export FORGE_CLI_ARCH=node10-win-x64 && npm run pack && zip -jr bin/forge-cli-utils.$FORGE_CLI_ARCH.zip bin/$FORGE_CLI_ARCH/* && rm -rf bin/$FORGE_CLI_ARCH
scripts.build:macos: export FORGE_CLI_ARCH=node10-macos-x64 && npm run pack && zip -jr bin/forge-cli-utils.$FORGE_CLI_ARCH.zip bin/$FORGE_CLI_ARCH/* && rm -rf bin/$FORGE_CLI_ARCH
scripts.build:linux: export FORGE_CLI_ARCH=node10-linux-x64 && npm run pack && zip -jr bin/forge-cli-utils.$FORGE_CLI_ARCH.zip bin/$FORGE_CLI_ARCH/* && rm -rf bin/$FORGE_CLI_ARCH
scripts.pack: npm run pack:dm && npm run pack:md && npm run pack:da
